message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. This gives us a good split while considering the future rounds.
Your offer was a bit too skewed in your favor, Alice. This is more balanced, and time is money - literally!
Bob, let's be realistic. We both lose with every round. This offer still gives you a decent share considering the inflation.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. We're both losing out because of our greed. Let's split it evenly and call it a day!
